ValidationRule.description: AR Brokers need Retrp Date populated on claims-made quotes

$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c &&
AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Received'), OR($User.LastName = "Basden", $User.LastName = "Cunningham", $User.LastName = "Gaglianese"), ISPICKVAL(Form_Type__c, 'Claims Made'), ISBLANK(Retro_Date__c ))
